title: Planeta Bio
typeOfFood: Lacto, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European
description: From the owners as Bio in Arroios. This restaurant typically offers 5 daily dishes in 3 sizes/combinations. Blue line subway/metro station: Avenida (exit to Praça da Alegria).
venueHours: Mon-Tue 12:00pm-4:00pm, Mon-Wed 7:00pm-12:00am, Wed 9:00am-7:00pm, Thu-Sat 12:00pm-4:00pm, Thu 7:30pm-12:00am, Fri-Sat 7:00pm-12:00am
